dt: {bc}a person who attacks settled beliefs or institutions
{bc}a person who destroys religious images or opposes their veneration

et: Medieval Latin {it}iconoclastes{/it}, from Middle Greek {it}eikonoklastēs{/it}, literally, image destroyer, from Greek {it}eikono-{/it} + {it}klan{/it} to break {ma}{mat|clast|}{/ma}
shortdef: a person who attacks settled beliefs or institutions
a person who destroys religious images or opposes their veneration
